item.title: The Future of TV
item.description:
The Future of TV

Matt McRae is fired up about remote controls. Or, more specifically, about getting rid of them. McRae is the chief technology officer of Vizio, a company that sells more TVs - and with them, remotes - than any other company in America. And he thinks remote controls are very, very stupid.

item.title: Baku
item.description:
Baku

Even when compared to city circuits Baku is unique - [it] is expected be the fastest street circuit on the F1 calendar... Hermann Tilke With the circuit set to host Formula One racing for the first time on June 17-19, Tilke says the layout and setting will present drivers with a completely original challenge.
